hook.text: Sweden has billionaires and a generous welfare state. Social democracy keeps capitalism but tames it.

buildup.text: Social democracy accepts market economies but uses taxes and regulation to ensure broad prosperity.

discovery.text: Free healthcare, education, and strong unions define the Nordic model. Markets exist but serve the public.

twist.text: Critics say high taxes slow growth. But Nordic countries rank among the richest and happiest on Earth.

climax.text: Social democracy is the dominant ideology in Northern Europe. It proves capitalism and welfare can coexist.

punchline.text: Social democracy doesn't abolish capitalism. It puts it on a leash.

quiz.question: How does social democracy relate to capitalism?
options: It keeps capitalism but uses taxes and regulation to ensure broad prosperity
It rejects all government intervention in markets
